content:
jlb6740 commented on issue #5007:

This change is to allow the performance testing to work for PRs to wasmtime main that are initiated from forked repos. This patch needs to be merged into mainline before working properly (i.e. can't be tested from this PR), but with help from @abrown an example of what is expected is here: https://github.com/jlb6740/wasmtime/pull/12
